title: Interpretation of dreams of all kinds for single and married women and men

preview.html: Which has its own interpretations for each type, as the interpretations differ depending on the colors and shapes, which you will know better when we present them to you during the article, so follow our interpretation of seeing a date in a dream for a single girl. The single girl when she sees black dates in her dream. It is evidence that he will have many. As it expresses About the end of the pain that she suffers from, whether psychological or physical. The unmarried girl who dreams that a young man wet her or gave her black dates, and this is evidence that this vision is good and that she will be able to achieve what she wants. The unmarried girl also saw that she was distributing dates On passers-by in the streets. It is an expression of the joys and pleasures that will soon knock on his door. Interpretation of seeing dates in a dream for a married woman. A married woman dreams that she is eating red dates. It is evidence that she will live a stable life and that she will feel very happy. But if a woman sees that she is cutting dates, this is evidence However, the vision in which dates are bought from within the market is evidence that they will have a lot of money in the coming period. If you see them stealing, go somewhere. It is an expression of his being exposed to many problems that may end in divorce. As for seeing yellow dates in a married woman’s dream. It is an expression that her marriage is good and also shows good livelihood after hardship. It also indicates seeing a married woman while dating. It is an expression of psychological comfort and wonderful nutrition that she will receive. A dream in which a married woman sees that she is selling Dates. It is unpleasant because it expresses the many conflicts that will arise in her family. Seeing green dates in a married woman’s dream means that she will become pregnant soon. This vision also means showing anxiety and feeling great happiness. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that a married woman’s vision of red dates Evidence of the strong relationship between the woman and her husband. Ibn Sirin also believes that a married woman who sees red dates expresses her vision of a good birth. In the case of every married woman there are red dates. It is evidence of an abundance of money, even if this woman suffers from many quarrels. With her husband. We chose for you: Interpretation of a dream about eating dates for a single woman. Interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees dates in a dream. Many scholars say that a pregnant woman who sees dates while eating is evidence that she will give birth to a boy. If a woman sees that she is protecting dates from palm trees, it is evidence that she She will get a lot of money after giving birth. A pregnant woman’s vision expresses her hope for a date other than her due date, which indicates that her due date is approaching. As for a pregnant woman who sees herself eating Ajwa dates, this is evidence that she will bring about a major financial revolution from her husband’s family. Woman A pregnant woman sees yellow dates. Evidence that her child will be a happy person in his life and will enjoy abundant livelihood. See also: Interpretation of the essence of history in a dream for single and married women. Interpretation of seeing dates in a dream about a man and its meaning. The man who sees...

title: Interpretation of a dream about jumping from a high place in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to jump from a high place and see yourself falling from a place. The dream of jumping from a height is a very confusing vision, but this vision may be from our subconscious mind to alert the nervous system at times, and you may also be interested in meeting the dead father in a dream, and on the other hand, it It can be an interpretable vision and in this article we will show you some interpretations in different cases. Interpretation of dreams to jump from a high place and seeing yourself falling from somewhere. Interpretation of a vision of jumping from a high place for a married woman. If a married woman sees her children jumping from a height, this means that her children will feel With independence and reliance on decision-making. Jumping from a height for a married woman indicates the death of worries and sorrows, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that she is jumping from a height, this indicates that what she wants will be achieved soon, God willing. If a married woman sees in a dream that there is an unknown person He jumps from her house, this indicates the end of problems and pressures. See also: Seeing a promise in a dream. Interpretation of the vision of jumping from a high place alone. If an unmarried woman sees that she is jumping from a high place to solid ground, this indicates that she is trying to achieve everything she desires and she will succeed, God willing. The vision indicates that she is jumping from a high place to solid ground. One person jumps from the top to marry a man of good character. However, if an unmarried woman sees someone jumping from the top of her house, this indicates that she wants to marry a good and pious man. If an unmarried woman sees that she is in a place far from her home and jumps from a height, this is evidence that she She will begin her work. See also: Seeing home furniture and rooms in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about jumping from a high place for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams that someone is jumping over her, this means that she will receive a lot of money soon. Seeing a pregnant woman jumping from top to bottom means getting rid of worries. If A pregnant woman sees that there are people jumping from top to bottom, then this indicates the fulfillment of desires. If she dreams that she is jumping from above, this indicates that her birth will be easy, God willing. If a pregnant woman sees that she is jumping from a window, this indicates that the fetus is healthy and that it will be born. In good health. See also: Crying and injustice in a dream. Interpretation of a man’s vision of jumping from a high place. If a man sees in a dream a beautiful and beautiful woman, the figure jumping from the top, and she wants him to join him. This indicates changes in his life for the better and good news will come to him. If a person sees in his dream That he jumped from a height, this means that he will achieve great profits and gains from his work. A man jumping on the ground in a dream is evidence that he is a very humble person who hates arrogance. See also: The girl in a dream. Interpretation of seeing jumping from a high place for a widow. Seeing a widow jumping from a high place is evidence of She strives for the best and changes circumstances for the better. If a widow sees herself jumping from a height, this indicates that what she wants will soon come true. See a high jump. Visions in a dream come in different forms and see a jump from above. This vision occupies the minds of many people

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing electricity in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see electricity in a dream, electricity has become a necessary and necessary thing in the life of every person, especially after this very great civilizational and architectural progress in buildings and towers and great technological progress, so that it has become necessary in life and when many companies are disrupted and companies are collapsing, because it is one of the possible To see electricity in a dream, and therefore, the dream interpretation of seeing electricity in a dream has many clues about the life of the person who sees what is good for him in his life and what is harmful to him. Interpretation of the dream of seeing electricity Part: A power outage is bad in real life, so what about seeing it in a dream ? Interpretation of a dream about seeing electricity cut off in a dream. The interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees a power cut in a dream indicates that she will face difficulties and heartaches in her next life. Also, seeing electricity and drinking water with it indicates that she will soon face problems, difficulties and obstacles in her life. Also, A married woman seeing that she was able to untie a group of electrical cables indicates that there are people planning to hide them. Seeing an electric light indicates that the dreamer of this dream is a strong person with a strong personality. Also, seeing a power outage without being electrocuted symbolizes the dreamer’s liberation from difficulties. In his life. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing an amusement park in a dream in detail. Interpretation of the dream about electricity. Despite the importance of electricity in our lives, it is a source of great danger when misused, and the interpretation of dreams about electricity has many meanings. If a woman suffers from an electrical defect because of her husband, this indicates the presence of Something bad is done by the breadwinner, it may be separation. Seeing an electric spark emitting without harm indicates the end of problems and crises. Also, a pregnant woman’s dream of electricity indicates the situation she is in because of her anxiety about the birth of her child. Also, seeing herself trying to harm others symbolizes the severity of Her hostility towards that person. Likewise, if someone tries to harm her with electricity, this indicates the presence of someone who seeks to harm her. To see in a dream someone you know who was electrocuted, which led to his death, this indicates the possibility of contracting a serious illness. Or that this person who was electrocuted led to Until his death, he goes through major crises due to his ignorance of how to deal with them. It appears that this person needs help from God. Interpretation of saving someone from electricity in a dream. The meaning of the thing can really help in interpreting the dream, such as: Interpretation of the dream of saving someone from the present. If the sleeper sees people About to be electrocuted and saved them from it, this indicates that the person is capable of taking responsibility. Just as he sees someone being saved from the current, this indicates that the dreamer advises him and corrects the course of that person’s life for the better. Or that she helped him get rid of something bad that he was addicted to And if the sleeper sees that his son was electrocuted and saved him, this indicates that he saved his son from the danger surrounding him. Also, seeing electricity and fire in a dream shows those who hate

title: Interpretation of dreams about the menstrual cycle for a married, non-pregnant woman

preview.html: Interpretation of the appearance of the menstrual cycle for a married, non-pregnant woman: If a married woman who has not given birth sees in her dream that she is menstruating, this means that she will become pregnant. When a married woman sees in a dream that she is stained with a large amount of menstrual blood, then in reality this woman is suffering from some financial problems. This indicates There is money on the way to her and her situation changes for the better. Seeing menstrual blood stop in a married woman’s dream indicates a lack of feelings and emotions. If a married woman is suffering from some problems in marriage, and she sees in a dream that she has been cleansed of menstrual blood. This represents the end of her problems with Her husband. Seeing a married woman in a dream who has gone through menopause means that she is suffering from menstrual blood. This indicates that she is in good health. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is suffering from heavy menstrual blood, and the menstrual blood is dark red in color. This indicates her success in achieving Her dreams and aspirations. If a married woman sees in a dream that her clothes are stained with her menstrual blood, this indicates that the woman has committed many sins, committed adultery, and harmed her reputation. A married woman seeing herself in a dream means washing her clothes stained with menstrual blood, and this indicates that she She will live happily and joyfully in her coming days. When a married woman dreams that she is in a relationship with her husband, this indicates her trip to another country and that she will leave the country in which she lives. See also: I dreamed that I had my menstrual cycle when I was married. Interpretation of monitoring the menstrual cycle for a married pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman in The dream means that a lot of blood will come out from the menstrual cycle, and this means that she will be exposed to some problems and pain during pregnancy. If a pregnant woman sees menstrual blood in a dream and that woman is in the first months of her pregnancy, this indicates the loss of her fetus. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream suffering From menstrual blood without feeling pain means that the fetus she is carrying is male. Interpretation of monitoring the menstrual cycle for unmarried women. Seeing the same unmarried girl in a dream means that she is washed with heavy menstrual blood. In the groom presenting that girl and marrying her to him, and that this groom has a lot of money. Seeing An unmarried girl in a dream, suffering from menstrual pain, means that this girl has committed many shameful acts that harm her reputation. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream menstrual bleeding accompanied by pain, then she feels comfortable afterward. This indicates that she has faced Some difficult problems that will be resolved over time. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream means that she is going through her last days, and this indicates the end of her worries and the solution of her problems. To dream of an unmarried and engaged girl, with menstrual blood, means that her marriage is approaching. When she sees that menstrual blood Black in color in a dream, in the dream of an unmarried woman, this indicates that she is obtaining prohibited money. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that her menstrual blood is red, this indicates that she is wasting her money. Seeing an unmarried woman stained with menstrual blood in a dream indicates Danger

title: Interpretation of seeing wearing a bra in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing wearing an earring in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi The vision of wearing an earring is one of the good visions that scholars and interpreters have collected in dreams as good signs. It has many interpretations because its interpretation varies depending on the type of earring, whether it is gold. Or silver or precious stones. The interpretation of seeing wearing an earring in a dream also varies depending on the dreamer, whether he is a man, a single or married girl, or a pregnant woman. In detail, the aspects are as follows: Interpretation of the vision of moving the neck of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that when a person sees that he is wearing an earring in his dream, it is a sign of blessing, goodness, and the emergence of happiness. If the dreamer is wearing an earring in his ear, the interpretation of wearing an earring in a dream varies depending on the type of earring. If the earring is of gold, this is evidence that his wife will give birth to a son. If the ring is of silver, this means that his wife will give birth to a daughter, and God knows best. If a man sees in a dream that his wife is wearing an earring, this is a sign of his superiority and brilliant success in his work, and profit in his profession. And happiness and material to solve problems. But if he sees that he is wearing two pearl rings, this is an indication that he will enjoy all the benefits of this world and his feeling of happiness and prosperity in the coming period, God willing. An earring in a dream may be a sign of his obedience to God and that he will memorize the Qur’an and learn to read it perfectly, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a bra for a single girl: The interpretation of seeing an unmarried girl wearing an earring in a dream varies depending on whether she was wearing an earring, took it off, or lost the earring in the dream. But if she sees that she is wearing a silver earring, this indicates that she is engaged. But if she sees that she is pulling her neck This is a sign of emotional problems. If she sees in a dream that she has lost her neck, this is evidence of her separation from her lover, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a bra for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a gold earring, this is evidence of her pregnancy, and if It was a silver earring, then this is evidence of sustenance and abundance of money. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a bra for a pregnant woman: When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a golden earring, this is a sign that God will give her a son. But if she dreams that she is wearing a silver earring, this is evidence that her child will be a girl, and God knows best. Interpretation of a vision of a man wearing a necklace When a man sees that he is wearing an earring, this is evidence of his profit from his business, and he has earned a lot of money, and God knows best.

title: Interpretation of dreams when I see someone shaking hands with someone I know in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams when I see someone shaking hands with someone I know in a dream. A handshake in a dream can indicate many different meanings, but in general it is considered a promising vision for its owner, especially if the person in a dream shakes hands with someone he does not know, it means the next good for the patient. The fortuneteller, and it means that his next life will be happy, and shaking hands in a dream means the end of disputes and the end of hostility, and also shaking hands with single people by someone you do not know, means that he will be in contact. Soon, and here in the lines of the article everything related to the interpretation of a dream when I see someone I know shaking hands in a dream. I see in a dream shaking hands with someone I know. Shaking hands with someone I know in a dream has many connotations. In general, seeing someone shaking hands in a dream brings goodness to the dreamer and is considered a dream of love. The following are the indicators of this vision in the following points: A handshake in general in a dream means love and it means the peace that a person experiences. If a person shakes hands with his enemy in a dream, this means that the disputes between him and his enemy will end. Shaking hands with one of his parents or one of his sisters in a dream is considered a sign of a desire to The dreamer is committed to maintaining kinship ties. If a woman shakes hands with her mahrams in a dream, this means that she is good to her. If a woman is seen shaking hands with someone other than her mahram, this indicates her support for him and her attribution to him. An unmarried woman who sees a handshake in her dream indicates the beginning of a new relationship for her. If one sees in his dream that he is shaking hands with a dead person, it means that he misses him. If he shakes hands with a righteous man, this means that the dreamer is a pious man who God watches over his behavior. A handshake in a dream indicates that there is benefit coming to the pioneer. Shaking the hand of an old man in a dream indicates that The dreamer will marry a girl of extraordinary beauty. If someone shakes hands in a dream with someone he knows, this means mutual benefit between them. Shaking hands with an unknown woman indicates the upcoming happiness of the fortuneteller. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing rubber in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Psychological. If the one who shakes hands in a dream is her husband, this is a sign of good life and affection between them. If a married woman sees that the one who shakes hands with her is her father, this indicates the success of her marriage. If a married woman sees that her brother shakes hands with her in a dream, this means She will get pregnant soon. A married woman who sees one of her children holding hands means that her son has excelled in studies. A woman shaking hands with a famous person means that she occupies a high position. title: Learn about the interpretation of the king in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation scholars explained that seeing the king in a dream carries many signals and messages for the dreamer, including positive and negative, and the interpretation of dreams generally depends on various factors, especially the circumstances of the dreamer’s life and the interpreter’s interpretations. It will deal with the most important interpretations of seeing the king in a dream for both single and pregnant women. The king in a dream Seeing the king in a dream is an indication that the owner of the vision will in the future obtain a position that allows him to influence and control, and seeing royalty in a debtor’s dream is a sign that he will soon become one. He is able to pay all his debts and leave his country and travel to another country. Seeing kings in a dream is evidence of a pleasant occasion for the family soon, and seeing a king symbolizes that the dreamer will acquire something valuable in the coming days and must preserve it and also lead to the fulfillment of the desire that he longed for. Whoever dreams that the king visits him in his home is a sign of improved living conditions and an improvement in the financial situation by obtaining a new job. The king in the student’s dream indicates that good luck will be his companion and that he will excel in his work. The academic field: As long as someone suffers from poverty, the dream is good news that God Almighty will open a new door for him. The King in a Dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin confirmed that whoever sees during his sleep that he is sitting with a king is a sign of progress in work or obtaining a new, better position. The stranger is a sign that he will travel to this country. As for someone who was suffering from an illness and the pain increased, the dream indicates recovery from the illness and a return to health and well-being. Seeing the kings of one of the Arab countries is good news that the dreamer is currently on the right path and will be able to achieve all his dreams. Seeing yourself talking with the king is a sign of getting closer to God Almighty with all duties and worship, such as the dreamer’s desire for the satisfaction of God Almighty. The king in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq believes that seeing one of the kings of a foreign country is a vision in which there is no good, because it symbolizes that the dreamer will be exposed in the coming days. Coming to a big problem and he won't be able to face it. From developed countries, as for whoever sees during his sleep that the king refuses to extend his hand to him, this is evidence of committing sins and immorality to satisfy his desires and soul, and he must repent and draw closer to God Almighty. The life and psychological circumstances that every dreamer goes through. For an unmarried woman who has an internal desire to get married, the dream foretells that she will marry someone who has a high status, honor, and power. As for the dreamer who wants to get a job in a prominent place, his dream foretells that he will get what he desires. In it. As for whoever sees himself sitting with one of the kings at a table, this indicates that she will become one of the rich. As for whoever dreams that the king is standing far away from her and does not have enough courage to approach him, this is a sign of grave injustice, but God Almighty is able to restore the person. Sitting with kings for single people is evidence that they are a leadership personality, and

title: Learn about the interpretation of ice cream in a dream by leading scholars

preview.html: Ice cream in a dream Ice cream is considered one of the best foods, whether for adults or children, because of its distinctive taste and its many types and shapes. It is strange to see ice cream in a dream and perhaps it is associated with many good meanings for the fortuneteller, and this is in most interpretations, and if you are interested in knowing the interpretation of ice cream in a dream, follow us in the following. Ice cream in a dream The interpretation of a dream about ice cream symbolizes a life full of kindness and extreme psychological comfort. Interpretation scholars indicate that a dream about ice cream is an affirmation of goodness in general, but if it is spoiled or in bad taste, then the many dreams that the dreamer had will be lost and he will be exposed to a strong disappointment that will cause him a deep shock for him.Ice cream in a dream by Ibn SirinOne of the signs of seeing ice cream According to Ibn Sirin, it is a sign of luck that turns from misery to joy, as the visionary receives news that promises him pleasure and says: When an unmarried woman eats ice cream, this is an indication of the speed of her marriage to a rich man who has great generosity. Ibn Sirin interprets ice cream in a dream It is a good thing because it brings peace to the dreamer. Go to the Dream Interpretation website online from Google and you will find all the interpretations you are looking for. Ice Cream in a Dream Al-OsaimiImam Al-Osaimi gives good news to a person when he sees ice cream in his dream and says that there is good news and it is very close to him But if it is corrupt or in bad shape, there will be some wrong decisions that need to be judged and reviewed so that it does not lead to error and sadness later. As for ice cream containing strawberries, it is a good omen for a person, as it indicates generosity in his morals and the kind words with which he supports Those around him and his refusal to harm others, that is, he is a person who faces mercy and compassion for everyone. Ice cream in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about ice cream for a single woman indicates an abundance of meanings of happiness. It indicates the great generosity and luxury that she will experience with her fiancé, and perhaps the wedding will take place in the days The next few, so you should plan well for that. The most beautiful days of her life. One of the meanings of seeing white ice cream in a dream for a girl is that it expresses her good morals, in addition to being a happy sign. - Praise be to God - and her working conditions are improving soon. Buying ice cream in a dream for a single woman When a girl buys beautiful, colorful ice cream in her dream, and it has a different flavour, this proves the multiplicity of successful things she achieves, as she witnesses great success at work in addition to her ability to move to a place More stable and safer. profession. For her.Eating ice cream in a dream for a single woman. Eating ice cream in a dream suggests different meanings for the girl, and in general, it can be emphasized that conditions will improve for her and bring clear stability to her days.Ice cream in a dream for a married woman. Commentators explain that there are multiple meanings associated with the vision of a married woman. For ice cream, if it has a nice or delicious taste, its life

title: I dreamed that I saw my deceased neighbor and he said that he missed me

preview.html: I dreamed that I saw my deceased neighbor and he said that he missed me. Dreams have always been the subject of many questions. Since ancient times, it has been an obscure topic that has preoccupied scholars and interpreters. The ancients believed that dreams are a gift and appreciation from God to whoever sees them and a message to him and his people, but they hindered the development of science, especially psychology. There is a more accurate explanation for this wonderful phenomenon. Some psychiatrists believe that the brain regulates the events of the day, our thoughts and feelings during sleep, and focuses on the most important events and information, and while performing this function these ideas appear before us in the form of dreams and we interact with them as if they were real, as they are part of it and part of the information already stored in our memory and in our next article. We will list all the possible interpretations of one of the dreams that many people are searching for an interpretation of. I dreamed that I saw my dead neighbor and said that he missed me. On the authority of the scholar Ibn Sirin. He is Abu Bakr ibn Sirin al-Basri, the Muslim scholar and imam who excelled in many fields of jurisprudence, hadith, and interpretation, as well as the system and judiciary, and he was He is very religious and attached to his parents. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a dead person longing to live in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. There are many interpretations of seeing a dead person’s longing in a dream, some of which are good and some are bad, and his words are words of truth, for he is in the abode of truth and his word is truth, and whoever sees. That he longs to see someone other than the Messenger or the father and mother, so this is a vision that indicates that the dreamer is about to do something that may be good or bad, depending on the person he longs to see. Interpretation of a dream about someone saying I miss you. Feeling longing in a dream indicates alienation and separation, and seeing a dead person. Longing for a living person may mean the death of that person, and whoever sees himself longing for someone, this indicates that the dreamer is suffering from sadness, distress, and suffering in life, just like seeing an unmarried woman longing for someone in a dream, this indicates many sins. And the narrow situation. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person: Although death is what frightens a person most in real life and causes fear and panic, seeing death in a dream has many positive interpretations, among which is that it indicates safety and compassion for the grieving person, and indicates the return of confidence and recovery. For the sick, the freedom of the prisoner, and the return of the absent, if the dreamer sees himself expressing himself and crying. But he was not buried, as this indicates his elevation in the world. But if he sees himself buried, this indicates the loss of his wealth, and whoever sees a dead person telling him in a dream that he is not dead, then he is one of the witnesses, and everything the dead person says to the dead person. The divine in a dream is truly and truthfully, whoever sees a dead person with a black face died as an infidel. Dream of seeing a neighborIf the dreamer sees his old neighbor in his dream, this indicates his nostalgia for his past, as it shows that he may meet a family member and long for him. New Year If the neighbor is tired, pale or sick, this indicates a year full of obstacles and fears. At the end of our article we mentioned a brief description of the scholar Ibn Sirin, and we also explained Ibn Sirin’s dream interpretation of the dream of seeing a dead person longing to live,

title: Interpretation of seeing turnips in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing turnips in a dream through seeing the website roy2a.com. Turnips are one of the root crops that need a moderate climate to grow. Various dishes of turnips are eaten boiled, pickled, or soup. Today, through this article, we will present to you the interpretation of seeing turnips in a dream. According to great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the status of the dreamer, whether he is male, single, or married. Interpretation of seeing turnips in a dream. Dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing turnips in a dream. It indicates many worries and anxieties in the dreamer’s life. Eating turnips in a dream indicates that the dreamer will face many problems and crises in his life in the coming period. Seeing the dreamer throwing a plate of turnips in a dream indicates that the dreamer has gotten rid of The difficult period he went through recently. Ripe turnips in a dream. It indicates that the fortuneteller’s conditions and conditions will improve for the better in the coming period. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing a green salad in a dream. Interpretation of seeing turnips in a dream for Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi will interpret seeing turnips in a dream. It indicates many good and abundant foods for the pioneer. Eating turnips in a dream indicates that God will alleviate the distress and remove the dreamer’s worries. Buying turnips in a dream indicates that God will bless the dreamer with a lot of goodness, sustenance and blessings in his life. Boiled white turnips in a dream indicates that the fortuneteller will achieve great profits and gains through his own work. Interpretation of seeing turnips in a dream for a single woman. Seeing single red turnips in a dream shows that she will soon marry someone she loves deeply and who suits her. Eating pickled turnips in a single woman’s dream announces that she will achieve great success and excel in her academic and professional life. Planting turnips in a dream for an unmarried woman says that she will soon hear Good news about her life. Eating turnips and beets in a dream for an unmarried woman announces that the coming period of her life will be full of happiness and joy. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing parsley in a dream. Interpretation of seeing turnips in a dream for a married woman. Seeing green turnips for a married woman in a dream. It indicates the occurrence of promising things in life. Professionalism for her husband. Preparing pickled turnips in a dream for a married woman. It indicates many happy events that will occupy her family in the coming period. Buying turnips in a dream for a married woman. It indicates the end of all the disputes that existed between her and her husband. Cutting turnips in a dream for a married woman indicates the emergence of crises. And there are many problems between her and her husband during this period. Interpretation of seeing turnips in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman seeing turnips in a dream announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Red turnips in a dream for a single woman indicates that she will undergo an easy and accessible birth process and will not suffer from fatigue or pain. Interpretation of the vision Turnips in a man’s dream: Eating turnips in a man’s dream indicates providing a fair male offspring. Seeing a man pulling a turnip from the ground in a dream indicates that God will provide
